item.title: Privacy of Real-Time Pricing in Smart Grid
item.description: This paper proposes using Differential Privacy to protect household occupancy states in smart grids by perturbing electricity rates before publication, demonstrated through a Markov model and tested on data inspired by household occupancy models. In the IEEE Conference on Decision and Control, 2019.
